verbose_text: Second, although PPARgamma activation induces anti-inflammatory effects in the brain, as shown in our study and other studies XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR that investigated neuro-dysfunction, our results showed a trend toward a protective effect of atorvastatin on inflammatory factors from circulatory immune cells, which may be because PPARgamma receptors are also expressed in monocytes and macrophages.
